    AddConsumersCheck(IHealthChecksBuilder, String, Nullable<HealthStatus>, Nullable<IEnumerable<String>>)

    Adds an health check that verifies that all consumers are connected.

    Declaration
    public static IHealthChecksBuilder AddConsumersCheck(this IHealthChecksBuilder builder, string name = "Consumers", HealthStatus? failureStatus = default(HealthStatus? ), IEnumerable<string>? tags = default(IEnumerable<string>? ))
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    IHealthChecksBuilder builder

    The .
    System.String name

    The health check name. If null the name 'OutboundQueue' will be used for the name.
    System.Nullable<HealthStatus> failureStatus

    The that should be reported when the health check fails. Optional. If null then the default status of will be reported.
    System.Nullable<IEnumerable<System.String>> tags

    A list of tags that can be used to filter sets of health checks. Optional.
    Returns
    Type Description
    IHealthChecksBuilder

    The so that additional calls can be chained.
